text: @Mike_Pence @VP @realDonaldTrump The Covid-19 trials will be fast unlike the Neremberg trials. Most of the evidence is well documented in the public domain. The rest is well documented by are intel agencies and internal communications. There will be no hiding any of this from the American people. #COVID19Trials
